TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Lotong, title = Lotong, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lotong} }

S.FORM: kahengangay ko hemot no lotong Ono 哺乳類 a 'a'adopen konini. O 台 灣 獼猴(lotong) ko Lotong a ma'min i Taywan.
